SourceText: *Cooking with Maths*
text: *边做饭边数数*

SourceText: Cooking can help your child start learning maths!
text: 做饭的过程也可以是学习数学的过程！

SourceText: 💚 Invite your child to help you cook for your family, or to choose something they would like to cook
text: 💚 邀请孩子帮你做饭，或者其它他们想做的吃的。

SourceText: 🍅 Ask your child to count different ingredients. Help them if it’s difficult!
text: 🍅 让孩子数一数不同的食材各有几个。如果孩子遇到困难，记得帮帮他们！

SourceText: 🔟 Help your child to understand adding and subtracting quantities
text: 🔟 帮孩子理解加减法

SourceText: 📝 Encourage your child to recognise numbers on packaging
text: 📝 鼓励孩子识别包装袋上的数字

SourceText: 👀 Ask your child about the different sizes of ingredients - e.g. which is bigger/biggest?
text: 👀 问问孩子不同食材的大小，比如：哪个土豆更大，或者哪个土豆最大呀？

SourceText: 🔄 Think about when you will cook together again! You can also practise understanding numbers and quantities during other activities like shopping or building/making things
text: 🔄 找时间和孩子一起做饭吧！除了做饭，你也可以利用其他活动来教孩子识记数字和认知数量，比如购物、搭积木、做手工。

SourceText: *Following Instructions*
text: *听从指令*

SourceText: 👂 Play a game in which your child listens to and tries to remember strings of instructions.
text: 👂  和孩子玩一个游戏，孩子需记住一连串指令。这个游戏有助于他们在学校和日常生活。

SourceText: This will be useful in school, at home, and later in life!
Start with just one instruction using an object in your home. For example “touch the red ball” 🔴
text: 先找到一样家里有的东西，给出一个指令。比如，“拿起红色的球”🔴然后，孩子必须拿起红色的球。

SourceText: Slowly add more instructions (e.g “then pick up the cup ☕), but tell your child that they can only start once you’ve finished giving the instructions.
text: 逐渐添加更多指令（比如：“放下红球，然后拿起杯子☕”）。提醒孩子，等所有指令说完后再行动。看看他们能记住并执行多少个指令！

SourceText: See how many your child can follow without forgetting!
🔄 Now swap roles! It’s your child’s turn to give you instructions! They can use the same objects if they want.
text: 🔄 角色互换，轮到孩子给你指令了！指令不一定相同，他们也可以使用不同的物品和指令。

SourceText: You can also try this game with a group of children! Make sure they take turns :)
text: 你还可以同时和好几个孩子一起玩这个游戏！记得确保让孩子们轮流来，这样每个人都有机会玩😃

SourceText: *One-on-One Time*
text: *一对一时光*

SourceText: 💚 Spending time just with your child and taking an interest in them can improve your relationship
text: 💚 与孩子共度一对一时光，给予他们充分的关注，这可以增进你和孩子的感情。

SourceText: 👀 When you child is playing alone or occupying themselves quietly, join them and show interest in what they are doing
text: 👀 当孩子独自玩耍时，你可以加入他们，让他们知道你对他们玩的东西很感兴趣。

SourceText: 👂Ask questions about their activity, and listen to them
text: 👂 问他们正在做什么，并仔细聆听他们的回答。

SourceText: Let your child lead the activity, follow them to build their confidence and autonomy 😃
text: 让孩子主导游戏，听从他们的玩法，这有助于培养孩子的自信心和自主性。 😃

SourceText: 👀 Say what you see - describing everything and supporting your child’s actions
text: 👀 说出你所看到的：描述你看到了什么，并对孩子表示肯定和支持。

SourceText: Be positive, praise your child, and enjoy spending this time with them 😃💚
text: 保持积极的态度，多多赞美孩子，与他们共同享受美好时光吧！ 😃💚

SourceText: *Playtime with Books*
text: *边读边玩*

SourceText: 📖 Book sharing will help your child learn and is a fun, playful activity to spend quality time together
text: 📖 陪孩子一起读书不仅有助于他们学习，而且是一项充满乐趣的亲子活动，可以让你和孩子共度高质量的亲子时光

SourceText: ⏰ Choose a time when you won’t be disturbed, and try to stop any distractions - e.g. turn off the TV and put away phones
text: ⏰ 选择一个不会有人打扰的时间，并尽量杜绝任何会让你们分心的东西，比如你可以关掉电视、放下手机

SourceText: 📖 If your child wants to choose a book, that’s fine, otherwise choose for them
text: 📖 如果孩子有想要读的书，那再好不过了。没有的话，帮他们选一本。

SourceText: 💚 Sit close together and follow your child attention and lead
text: 💚 和孩子挨着坐，关注他们的注意力在哪里，由孩子引导。

SourceText: Point at things, name and repeat words. Help your child learn more about what interests them in the book 👀
text:
指着书上的事物，让孩子说出相应的名称，多重复几遍。
帮孩子多了解他们最感兴趣的内容 👀

SourceText: If there are words or numbers in the book, ask and help your child recognise numbers and simple words 💡
text: 如果书上有汉字或数字，可以借机向孩子提问，帮孩子认识数字和简单的字词 💡

SourceText: Link things in the books to your child life, and use words about emotions and talk about them! 😃
text: 将书中的事物与生活联系起来，并加入与情绪相关的词汇，借机帮助孩子识别和表达情绪。😃

SourceText: 🔄 If possible, start a regular routine to read together when your child isn’t too tired or hungry
text: 🔄 尽量和孩子养成共读的习惯，阅读时间最好选在孩子不累也不饿的时候。

SourceText: Reading together is one of the best ways to help your child learn and prepare for success in school! 🎓
text: 亲子共读是帮助孩子学习知识、提高孩子学习能力最好的方法之一！🎓

SourceText: Link things in the books to your child's life, and use words about emotions and talk about them! 😃
text: 将书上的事物与你孩子的生活联系起来。如果可以的话，再加入一些与情绪相关的词汇，借机教孩子识别和表达情绪！😃

SourceText: *I Spy!*
text: *找一找*

SourceText: 👀 I spy is a fun game to play with your child that will help them learn about pinyin!
text: 👀 游戏“找一找”可以帮助孩子学习拼音！

SourceText: Choose an object or a thing around you, and don’t tell your child what it is. It should be something that your child knows the word for. For example “ball” ⚽
text: 选择一个你周围的东西，必须是你孩子知道的东西，比如“球”⚽，但先不要告诉孩子你选的是什么。

SourceText: 👀 Then say “I spy with my little eye, something beginning with *and then say the shengmu* which in this case is “q”
text: 👀 然后说：“小眼睛，找一找，谁的声母是......” 例如，如果是“球”，那么就说“小眼睛，找一找，谁的声母是qqq （读‘七七七’）”

SourceText: Your child should look around and guess what the object is. When they guess it right, praise them and swap roles! If they can’t get it, give them some clues, like “it’s round” or “it’s black and white”. ✅
text: 这时孩子会到处找一找，猜你选的东西是什么。当他们猜对时，记得夸奖他们，然后和他们交换角色！如果猜不出来，给他们一些线索，比如“它是圆的”或者“它是黑白相间的”。 ✅

SourceText: Play this game with as many objects as possible and as many different ciyu! Help your child to learn about the different wordsand sounds . This will help them learn to read at home and school. 🎓
text: 每次玩游戏时，选择不同的物品和词语，越多样越好！这能帮助孩子学习词汇和读音，提升阅读能力。 🎓

SourceText: *Categorising and Organising*
text: *分类和归纳*

SourceText: Help your child to learn by sorting objects and things! 🔵🔷
text: 分类和归纳游戏能提升孩子的认知和逻辑思维能力！🔵🔷

SourceText: Your child will learn by understanding how things fit and group together (eg, bear = animal
text: 孩子可以先学习如何归类和分组（例如，熊=动物，芒果=水果，蓝色=颜色）

SourceText: mango = fruit, blue = colour) 🧸
Find a book with different pictures and help your child to find things in a particular category (e.g. “Find all of the animals”) 👀
text: 找一本有很多插图的书，然后让孩子在书中寻找某个特定类别的东西（比如“找出所有的动物”）👀

SourceText: Find safe objects in the house, get your child to group them by colour, size, or types of object (potatoes, cucumbers). Then make more complicated categories (e.g. small potatoes, big potatoes) 🥔
text: 在家中找出一些没有危险性的物品，并且让孩子把它们按照颜色、大小或物品类别（比如土豆、黄瓜）进行分组。然后再试一试更复杂的分组方式（比如小土豆、大土豆）🥔

SourceText: 🔄 You can play the categorising game anywhere! Just look around and ask your child to find things from the category you say!
text: 🔄 你们可以在任何地方玩这个分类游戏！你只需看看四周有什么，想出一个类别，然后让孩子去寻找相应的东西！

SourceText: *What Wordis This?*
text: 这是什么字？

SourceText: Playing games with pinyincan help your child learn how shengmu and yunmuare put together to make the sound of a character.
text: 拼音游戏可以帮助孩子学习声母和韵母，以及它们是如何组合成汉字发音的。

SourceText: 📝 Write a shengmuon a piece of card or paper (e.g. “p”)
text: 📝 在卡片或纸上写下一个声母（比如“p 坡”）

SourceText: 👂 Say the shengmuout loud and ask your child to say it too!
text: 👂 大声念出这个声母，让孩子跟着你一起读！

SourceText: Ask your child to say some words that begin with the shengmu“p”, give them clues like “What starts with “p”? Paopao… what else? 🌱
text: 让孩子说几个声母是“p 坡”的汉字，给他们一些提示，比如：“声母是‘p 坡’的字有哪些呀？泡泡、婆婆...... 还有什么呢？”🌱

SourceText: 👀 Ask your child to look for objects in your house that begin with a shengmu(eg “b” for beizi). Help them find things.
text: 👀 让孩子在家里寻找含有某个声母的物品（比如“b 波”可以找到“杯子”）。他们找不到时，你可以给些引导。

SourceText: 🔄 Try a new shengmu or yunmuevery day!
text: 🔄 可以每天尝试一个新的声母或韵母！

SourceText: *Riddles Help Children Learn*
text: *益智谜语*

SourceText: Riddles and puzzles are a fun way to build thinking skills! 💡
text: 谜语通常都很有趣，可以培养孩子的思维能力！💡

SourceText: Do you remember any riddles from your childhood? If you can’t then make one up, they can be very simple! 😃
text: 你还记得小时候的谜语吗？如果不记得，那就现编一个，不用很复杂，简单的就行！😃

SourceText: Like “What can you see at night but not in the day” Answer: “The moon” 🌙
text: 比如：“什么东西晚上能看到，但白天看不到？” 答案是：“月亮”（或者其他合理的事物） 🌙

SourceText: If your child is finding them difficult, try an easy one like: “What is round, bouncy and can be thrown or kicked?” Answer: “A ball” ⚽
text: 如果你的孩子觉得太难了，换一个更简单的谜语试试，比如：“什么东西圆圆的，有弹性，可以被扔来扔去，或者踢来踢去？” 答案是：“球”⚽

SourceText: Your child can also try making riddles! 💡
text: 孩子也可以试着自己编谜语！💡

SourceText: You can have fun with riddles anywhere at any time - like travelling on a bus or in a car 🚗
text: 你们可以随时随地玩谜语游戏，比如坐车的时候🚗

SourceText: *What's New?*
text: *点亮新技能*

SourceText: Learning is fun! 🎓
text: 学习可以是很好玩的！🎓

SourceText: ❓ Ask your child to think of a new, fun thing you could learn together.
text: ❓ 让孩子想一想，有什么有趣的、可以一起学的新事情。

SourceText: For example: keeping a ball in the air with your foot, juggling, cooking rice, tiaofangzi, whistling, learning all the provinces in China.
text: 例如：颠球、蒸米饭、跳房子、叠衣服、学习中国的所有省份等。

SourceText: 🔄 Take turns trying out the new thing. Make sure to praise each other and learn and play together!
text: 🔄 轮流去尝试新的东西。记得和孩子相互夸奖，一起边玩边学！

SourceText: 💛 Approach learning the thing in a kind and fun way, and do not judge your child or yourself for your ability in the process.
text: 💛 整个过程中，记得保持积极、友善、轻松愉快，不要过多地去评判孩子和自己。

SourceText: 😃 Once you have mastered the new thing, choose another thing to learn together.
text: 😃 一旦你们掌握了一项新东西，那就再选一个，再一起重新开始学习。

SourceText: *Make up a Story*
text: *编故事*

SourceText: Creating stories together is a great way to have fun with imagination - and to build your child’s creativity! 📖
text: 和孩子一起编故事既好玩，又能充分发挥孩子的想象力，培养孩子的创造力！📖

SourceText: 5️⃣ With your child, come up with 5 words to use. They can be any words you want! For example: banana, spaceship, fish, water, painting, cooking, wedding. If you need to remember them, write them clearly on a paper with your child.
text: 先和孩子一起想5️⃣个词语，可以是任何词语，比如：香蕉、宇宙飞船、鱼、水、画画、烹饪、婚礼等等。如果记不住这些词，可以和孩子一起写在纸上。

SourceText: 🎂 Start your story with, “Once upon a time, there was a…” and use one of the words from the list in the first part. For example, “Once upon a time, there was a family who worked on a *banana* farm.”
text: 🎂 故事可以这样开始：“从前，有一个……” 然后加入一个你们刚刚选的词。比如，“从前，有一家人以种‘玉米’为生。”

SourceText: 📝 Let your child make up the next part using another word from the list.
text: 📝 接着，让孩子用另一个词语，编出故事的第二句。

SourceText: 🔄 Take turns until you have used all the words and created a story.
text: 🔄 和孩子轮流编句子，直到你们用上了所有词语，编出了一个完整的故事。

SourceText: 🔔 Be creative and do not tell your child what to say. It does not need to be a real story to be fun!
text: 🔔 鼓励孩子的创造力，不需要告诉孩子应该说什么，让他们发挥自己的想象力。故事不一定要是真实的，有趣就行！

SourceText: 🎁 Ask your child what their favourite part of the story was, and tell them yours!
text: 🎁 问问孩子他们最喜欢故事的哪个部分，也告诉他们你最喜欢哪个部分！

SourceText: *Playing with Clothes*
text: *衣服游戏*

SourceText: 💡Help your child use their fingers, talk about clothes, and organise them!
text: 💡通过衣服游戏，孩子可以锻炼手指灵活性、认识颜色，并学会分类整理。

SourceText: Help your child exercise their fingers by showing them how buttons and zips work on clothes, and letting them practise using them! 👋
text: 👋 展示如何扣扣子、拉拉链，并让孩子练习，帮助他们提高手指灵活性。

SourceText: 🔵 Talk about the colours of clothes! Ask your child to pick a colour and talk about all the things that are that colour: “What are all the things we can think of that are blue?”
text: 🔵 让孩子认识衣服的颜色！让孩子选择衣服上的一种颜色，并说出其他同色物品，比如：“我们来想一想，什么东西是蓝色的呀？”

SourceText: 😃 Encourage your child to help you sort clothes into piles for each family member.
text: 😃 鼓励孩子按家庭成员分类整理衣服。比如：“爸爸的衣服都放这里，妈妈的衣服都放那里，宝宝的都放在中间。”

SourceText: *Playing with Vegetables*
text: *蔬菜游戏*

SourceText: 🌱 Help your child learn by thinking and talking about vegetables!
text: 🌱 蔬菜游戏可以鼓励孩子思考和学习！

SourceText: 🍅 Mix together 2-3 different ingredients of your choice (like onions, tomatoes and corn example). Say: “Help me sort these vegetables into piles?” Try sorting them by size.
text: 🍅 把两三种不同的食材（比如洋葱、西红柿和玉米）混在一起，然后说：“能帮我把这些蔬菜分类吗？”也可以试着让孩子按照大小分类。

SourceText: 😃 Remind me!
text: 😃 提醒我一下！

SourceText: Talk about your child’s experiences. Ask questions and wait for answers. Follow your child’s interest.
text: 问问孩子买菜时的经历，给他们点思考和回答的时间。别忘了要顺应孩子的兴趣。

SourceText: “Can you help me remember what is at the market?” “Do they sell carrots at the market?” “Do the sell anything yellow at the market?” “What else do they sell?” “Can you think of other things they sell?”
text: 比如，“你能帮我回想一下，超市里都在卖什么吗？”，“那里有卖胡萝卜的吗？”，“那里有卖什么黄色的东西吗？”，“那里还卖什么其他的东西吗？”，“你觉得他们还应该卖些什么？”

SourceText: 💡Can you think of something similar?
text: 💡 你能想到什么类似的东西吗？

SourceText: Say: We are going to think of some things that are similar or different from what I tell you. So listen carefully!”
text: 你可以说：“现在我说一个东西，你来想想有什么东西跟它很像。注意听！”

SourceText: Here is a tomato. Can you think of something else that is red like a tomato? 🍅
text: “这里有一个西红柿。你能想到其他什么东西，和西红柿一样是红色的吗？”  🍅

SourceText: Can you think something else that is round like a tomato? ⚽
text: “你能想到其他什么东西，和西红柿一样是圆的吗？” ⚽

SourceText: *Animals*
text: *动物游戏*

SourceText: 🧸 Active animals: Take turns with your child doing animal actions: Hop like a frog, stretch like a cat, run like a dog, slither like a snake, flap like a bird
text:
🧸 “活泼的小动物”
与孩子轮流模仿动物做动作，比如像青蛙一样跳，像小猫一样伸懒腰，像小狗一样奔跑，像蛇一样扭动，像鸟一样拍打翅膀。

SourceText: 💡All the animals we can think of - think about groups of animals!
text: 💡 动物分类

SourceText: What are all the animals we can think of that have feathers?
text: 我们能想到哪些有羽毛的动物？

SourceText: What are all the animals we can think of that eat plants? 🌱
text: 我们能想到哪些吃草的动物？🌱

SourceText: What are all the animals we can think of that lay eggs?
text: 我们能想到哪些下蛋的动物？

SourceText: 😃 Counting rabbits
text: 😃 数兔子

SourceText: 🔟 Find 10 rocks and put them in a line, tell your child that they are rabbits!
text: 找到🔟块石头，把它们排成一排。告诉孩子，假装它们是小兔子！

SourceText: Ask your child to count the rabbits!
text: 让孩子数数有多少只小兔子！

SourceText: Put the rabbits into 2 equal piles. Ask your child to give you 3 rabbits. Say “If you give me 3, how many rabbits do you have”
text: 把小兔子平均分成两堆，一人一堆。让孩子给你3只兔子，然后说：“如果你给我3只兔子，现在你还剩下多少只兔子？

SourceText: *Active Counting*
text: *边动边数*

SourceText: 👋 Clap, hop, jump: Play the following game with your child. Make it active!
text: 👋“ 拍手跳跃”。动起来吧！

SourceText: 1️⃣ Clap hands 1 time. 2️⃣ Clap hands 2 times.
text: 拍1️⃣次手。拍2️⃣次手。

SourceText: 1️⃣ Jump 1 time. 2️⃣ Jump 2 times.
text: 双脚跳1️⃣次。双脚跳2️⃣次。

SourceText: 1️⃣ Hop 1 time.
text: 单脚跳1️⃣次。

SourceText: 3️⃣ Hop 3 times.
text: 单脚跳3️⃣ 次。

SourceText: 💡Can you hop, then jump, then clap?
text: 💡你能先单脚跳1次，然后双脚跳1次，最后拍1次手吗？

SourceText: 🏆 Can you clap twice, jump once, and hop three times?
text: 🏆你能先拍2次手，然后双脚跳1次，最后单脚跳3次吗？

SourceText: 💡Remembering Instructions
text: 💡记指令

SourceText: Take turns playing a game where you give 2-3 instructions that the other person has to remember to follow. Make sure physical movement is included!
text: 一方给出2到3个指令动作，另一方必须记住并依次做出这些动作。你可以和孩子轮流给指令。指令里最好要包含身体动作哦！

SourceText: For example:
text: 比如：

SourceText: Hop twice, turn around.
text: 单脚跳2次，转1圈。

SourceText: Jump to the kitchen, pick up a spoon, then run back. ✅
text: 双脚跳到厨房，拿一把勺子，然后跑回来。✅

SourceText: *Thinking Games*
text: *思维游戏*

SourceText: ❗ Mama/Daddy says! Play this game of giving instructions:
text: ❗“妈妈/爸爸说”是一个关于发指令的游戏，比如：

SourceText: Mama/daddy says touch your head. Mama/daddy says open your mouth. Mama/daddy says turn around. Mama/daddy says touch your knees. Mama/daddy says jump twice. Mama/daddy says jump, then clap and sit.
text: 妈妈/爸爸说，摸摸你的头。妈妈/爸爸说，张开你的嘴。妈妈/爸爸说，转个圈。妈妈/爸爸说，摸摸你的膝盖。妈妈/爸爸说，双脚跳2次。妈妈/爸爸说，双脚跳1次，拍1次手，然后坐下。

SourceText: 👂 Go and stop: Play the game with your child
text: 👂 你还可以和孩子一起玩“一二三，木头人”

SourceText: Say: When I say “stop”, we freeze. When I say “go”, we can walk again.
text: 跟孩子说：“当我说‘木头人’的时候，我们就要变成不能动的木头人。当我说‘一二三’的时候，我们可以继续走路。”

SourceText: Once your child is familiar with the game, your child will lead.
text: 一旦孩子熟悉了游戏规则，试着让他们自己主导这个游戏。

SourceText: 🔵 🔴Blue-Red - now play this game!
text: 🔵 🔴“蓝色和红色”游戏

SourceText: If I say touch something blue, you need to touch something red. If I say touch something red, you need to touch something blue.
text: 如果我说摸蓝色的东西，摸红色的东西。如果我说摸红色的东西，摸蓝色的东西。

SourceText: *Games with Pictures!*
text: *图片游戏*

SourceText: 👂 Making up a story from an image
text: 👂 看图说话

SourceText: For example, say: We are going to make up a story about this picture. I can start. This little girl is feeling very excited today. Why do you think she is feeling excited?
text: 比如你说：“我们现在要看着这张图片，编一个故事。我先来。这个小女孩今天感觉特别高兴。你认为她为什么感觉很高兴呢？”

SourceText: 😃 She is holding her bag and has a big smile. Where do you think she is going?
text: “她拿着小包包，笑得很开心😃。你觉得她要去哪呢？”

SourceText: 👀 Can you point to it?
text: 👀 “你能找到吗？”

SourceText: Using a book or a magazine, or anything with pictures, say:
text: 找一本书、杂志或任何其他带有图片的东西，然后说：

SourceText: I am going to describe something on the page and you need to guess what it is and point to it. For example, “I see something that is [green and moves slowly].
text: “我现在要描述这里面的一个东西，你来猜猜我说的是什么。” 比如，“我看到一个东西，它是绿色的，并且走得非常慢。”

SourceText: Can you guess what it is?” 💚
text: 你能猜出它是什么吗？💚（答案是乌龟）

SourceText: *Shapes Everywhere!*
text: *无处不在的形状！*

SourceText: 📺 Squares, squares everywhere
text: 📺 到处都是正方形！

SourceText: 👀 Draw squares in the sand,  dirt, or on paper. Make some bigger and some smaller.
text: 👀 在沙子、土地或者纸上画几个正方形。画一些大的和一些小的。

SourceText: Tell your child, “this is a square.”
text: 告诉孩子：“这是正方形。”

SourceText: Ask your child to try to draw a square. Hold your child’s hand to help if this is hard.
text: 让孩子也试着画一个正方形。如果这对孩子来说比较难，你可以握住孩子的手，帮着一起画。

SourceText: Look for things around the home or outdoors that are the same shape.
text: 在家里或室外，找找其他相同形状的东西。

SourceText: Now do the same with circles! 🔴
text: 现在换成圆形，再来一遍！🔴

SourceText: *Story Telling*
text: *讲故事*

SourceText: 💡 Let’s make a story!
text: 💡 让我们一起来编故事！

SourceText: Say: We are going to make up a story. I will start then you will help me continue it.
text: 跟孩子说：“我们现在要编一个故事。我先开始，然后你来帮我继续往下编。”

SourceText: ⏰ ”Once upon a time there was…”
text: ⏰ “从前，有一个…”

SourceText: “What happened next?”
text: 问孩子，你觉得接下来发生了什么？

SourceText: “What happened after that?”
text: 继续问，之后又发生了什么呢？

SourceText: 👂 Tell me the story!
text: 👂 给我讲讲故事吧！

SourceText: Say to your child: “I have a book here that we have read before. Can you remember the story and tell it to me just by looking at the pictures?”
text: 对孩子说：“我这里有一本书，是我们之前一起读过的。你能光看图片，告诉我故事里讲了什么吗？”

SourceText: 👀 Show your child pictures in the book. Ask your child what is happening in the pictures and what happens next.
text: 👀 带孩子一起看书里的图片。问问孩子图片中正在发生什么，接下来又发生了什么。

SourceText: *I'm a Writer!*
text: *我是小小书法家*

SourceText: 📝 Have fun being creative with writing!
text: 📝 孩子可以在学写字的过程中，即享受乐趣，又培养创造力！

SourceText: You and your child can have fun writing with a pencil and paper, or with a stick and the sand!
text: 你和孩子可以用铅笔在纸上写字，也可以用木棍在沙子上写！如果孩子还不会写字，鼓励他们画出形状，试着模仿汉字的形状。

SourceText: If your child doesn’t know how to write characters, encourage them to draw shapes, and try to copy the shapes of characters. 🔵▶️
When they are more confident, encourage them to write simple characters. 😃
text: 当他们开始熟悉文字时，你可以鼓励他们开始写简单的汉字。😃

SourceText: Show them the simple things that you write - like shopping lists! Show them the characters they may know. Let them try to copy the characters! 📖
text: 给孩子看一些简单的东西，比如购物清单。找一找他们可能认识的字，指给他们看。也可以让他们试着模仿这些字！📖

SourceText: *A Friendly Chat*
text: *聊聊天*

SourceText: Talk to your child about something that they are interested in! 😃
text: 多和你的孩子聊聊他们感兴趣的事情！😃

SourceText: 💚 Spending quality time with your child and talking to them every day is a good way to develop a strong relationship.
text: 💚 每天和孩子交流，并且共度家庭时光，有助于建立积极的亲子关系。

SourceText: ⚽ An easy way to start talking to your child is to ask them about something they are interested in, for example you could talk about topics such as: sports, books, movies, friends, music, celebrities, or school.
text: ⚽ 开始聊天的方法可以是询问他们感兴趣的话题，比如体育、书或学校。

SourceText: 👂 You may not find everything your child shares to be interesting, but it’s important to show enthusiasm and an eagerness to learn.
text: 👂 即便对话题不感兴趣，还是要对孩子表现出你的热情，让孩子感受到你的关心。

SourceText: *Get Active*
text: *动起来！*

SourceText: Exercise is a great way to spend time together and it is so good for your health. 🌱 Find a sport or exercise that both you and your child want to do and try it out together!
text: 一起锻炼不仅是陪伴孩子的好方式，还有益健康。🌱 找到你们都喜欢的锻炼方式，一起动起来吧。

SourceText: ⏰ Even walking for 10 minutes a day is good for you.
text: ⏰  即使只是每天一起散步10分钟，也会有好处。

SourceText: ⚽ Together you can walk, run, play soccer, swim, dance, or do any other sport..
text: ⚽ 你们可以一起散步、跑步、踢足球、游泳、跳舞或者做任何其他运动。

SourceText: 🏆 Together, think of ways to make it even more fun. Can you jog to a certain point? Take turns being the coach? Can there be a small, free reward, like getting to decide the next activity?
text: 🏆 一起想办法，让运动变得更有趣。你们可以跑到某个特定的终点吗？或者轮流当教练？或许可以为赢家设置一个小小的奖励，比如有权决定下一个活动是什么。

SourceText: 🌈 Exercise becomes easier and more enjoyable the more you do it.
text: 🌈 运动越频繁，就会越熟练，也越愉快。

SourceText: 🔄 If you or your child do not like the first exercise you pick, try a new exercise.
text: 🔄 如果孩子不喜欢你选的运动，那就换个别的试试吧！

SourceText: *Pass the Ball*
text: *传球*

SourceText: Games are a great, fun way to spend time with your family!
text: 玩游戏是最有意思的家庭活动之一！

SourceText: 3️⃣ This game is best with at least 3 people.
text: 下面这个游戏最好有至少3️⃣个人参与。

SourceText: ⚽ Find a ball to play. If you cannot find a ball, choose an item you can safely throw around. For example, a bottle cap or a plastic cup.
text: ⚽ 先找到一个球。如果没有球，就找一个可以扔来扔去的东西，并且必须是安全的。比如，瓶盖或塑料杯子。

SourceText: ➡️ Start in a circle and pass the ball around.
text: ➡️ 大家站成一个圈，开始传球。

SourceText: 👋 Start throwing the ball in new directions (up, down, straight, curved, rolling on the ground) and with different forces (hard, soft, medium). You can bounce the ball, throw it in the air, and catch it a few times before passing it.
text: 👋 可以试着朝不同方向扔球（往上扔、往下扔、直着扔、从地上滚）。再试试用不同的力气扔球（重重地、轻轻地、不轻不重地）。或者，在传球之前，你可以把球在地上弹几下，或者自己先抛接几次。

SourceText: ✨ When everyone gets good at catching the ball, you can start moving around the room, still passing the ball.
text: ✨ 当每个人都熟练了之后，你们可以开始一边在房间里四处走动，一边传球。

SourceText: ⭐ Can you throw the ball under the leg? Behind the back? Over your head? Block a pass? Have fun with it!
text: ⭐ 想再难一点吗？试试把球从腿下面、从背后、从头顶传出去，或者试试拦截别人传的球。玩得开心！

SourceText: *Active Songs*
text: *动作儿歌*

SourceText: 😃 Young children love physical games! But they need reminders about how to play 💡
text: 😃 小孩子都特别喜欢能动起来的游戏！但是需要有人提示他们怎么玩 💡

SourceText: 🎵 Songs with movements are fun and active and give instructions on how to move!
text: 🎵 带动作的儿歌就很有趣，既能让孩子动起来，又能教他们听从指令。

SourceText: Sing songs to your child or a group of children in which they have to:
text: 比如，你可以唱一首歌，歌词里包括让孩子：

SourceText: Start ✅ and stop ❌
text: 开始 ✅ 和停止 ❌

SourceText: Slow down ⬇️ and speed up ⬆️
text: 慢下来 ⬇️ 加快速度 ⬆️ 等等

SourceText: *Follow the Leader!*
text: *模仿游戏*

SourceText: ⭐ Choose someone to be the leader (tip: start with an adult like yourself)
text: ⭐ 选择一个人作为领头人（小贴士：可以先选一个成年人，比如你自己)

SourceText: 😃 Other players line up behind the leader. The leader moves around in any way they like!
text: 😃 其他人排在领头人后面。领头人开始做动作,任何动作都可以！

SourceText: 🏁 They can run, jump, crawl, walk on tip toes, and any other way they want!
text: 🏁 比如跑、跳、爬、踮脚走路等等。

SourceText: 👀 The other players must copy what the leaders does, and the leader can change movements at any time.
text: 👀 其他人必须模仿领头人的动作，领头人也可以随时改变动作。

SourceText: 🔄 Players take turns being the leader!
text: 🔄 每个人轮流当领头人。

SourceText: *Be the Narrator*
text: *成为叙述者*

SourceText: 👀 Say what your child is doing while they are playing
text: 👀 孩子在玩的时候，你可以描述他们具体在干什么。

SourceText: 👂 This will help them learn the words to describe their actions.
text: 👂 这能帮他们学习如何用言语描述动作。

SourceText: 😃 You can do it in a simple way, or in a silly way like a sports commentator, a news presenter, or a game show host
text: 😃 你可以简单地描述几句，也可以用更有趣的方式，比如像个赛事解说员，或者新闻播报员，甚至是游戏节目主持人一样去描述。

SourceText: 💡 Ask questions like “what will you do next?” or “I see you want to put the ball in the bucket. Is there another way to do that?”
text: 💡 同时，还可以问孩子一些问题，比如“你接下来要做什么呀？”或者“我看到你想把球放进桶里。还能不能放在其他地方呀？

SourceText: *Be an Artist!*
text: *成为艺术家*

SourceText: 📝 Give your child some paper and a pen or pencil, or some different pens or pencils.
text: 📝 给孩子一些纸和笔。

SourceText: 😃 Let your child draw whatever they want to!
text: 😃 让孩子画任何他们想画的东西！

SourceText: 👀 Ask questions about what they are drawing, the size of the thing they are drawing, and the colours they are using.
text: 👀 问问孩子他们正在画什么，画的东西有多大，以及用了什么颜色来画。

SourceText: 🏆 If possible, put your child’s picture up on the wall when they are finished. Give praise to your child!
text: 🏆 如果可以的话，在孩子画完后，把他们的画贴在墙上。记得表扬孩子！
